channel.title: GIT on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog
channel.description: Recent content in GIT on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog

item.title: GIT hacks
item.description: fatal: in unpopulated submodule ‘x’ git rm --cached x git submodule add -b master --force https://gitlink/repo.git x where x : the name of the submodule delete pushed commit on the remote branch git reset --hard <last_working_commit_id git push --force
